entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 8:53 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High 10. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 8:53 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
